name: koha-plugin-command-palette
description: This plugin adds a command palette to the Koha staff client. It aims to make navigation easier for power users.

scripts.package-kpz:build: cd package-kpz && cargo build --release && cd ../ && ln -s ./package-kpz/target/release/package-kpz ./p-kpz
scripts.ktd-plugin-tools:build: cd ktd-plugin-tools && go build && cd ../ && ln -s ./ktd-plugin-tools/ktd-plugin-tools ./kpt

author: Paul Derscheid <me@paulderscheid.xyz>
